title: How to Milk a Cow By Hands | Evening Milking Of Cow By Hand

subtasks: Enter combine cab
Adjust seat and mirrors for visibility
Inspect combine controls
Start combine engine
Drive combine through field
Overlap rows for efficient coverage
Adjust combine settings for optimal harvest
Monitor grain tank filling
Stop combine and unload grain when tank is full

tasks.task: Adjusting combine for different crop conditions
subtasks: Modify combine settings based on wind direction
Navigate around obstacles in the field
Drive combine to storage area
Uncouple grain from combine
Clean combine and check for necessary maintenance
Transport harvested grain to storage facility
Weigh grain and record harvest data
Assess yield and make notes for future farming practices
